verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Just beyond the Veil
I long to see Your face
Just to see Your beauty there
just beyond the Veil

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Beautiful You are
Beautiful You are
Beautiful You are, You are.
Beautiful You are

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You're the prince of peace,
You're the prince of peace,
You're the prince of peace, You are.
You're the prince of peace.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Marvellous You are
Marvellous You are
Marvellous You are, You are
Marvellous You are
